Text: After that, the three of them go into town.

Look up, Cid! It is perfect weather today! Heheh...
A perfect sky for a perfect date with you!

Um... You guys are a bit clingy. It's kinda hard to
walk...

Hey. Can you cut out the massive delusion about being
on a date, Princess? I don't want my cute little brother
being harassed.

More importantly, Cid. Where do you want to go today?
You can tell your sister, okay?
Sis, you're going to pull my arm off...

Rose and Claire keep Cid jammed in between them
like a sandwich. Cid walks with the face of someone
condemned.

Claire, I worry that Cid is being squeezed to death
by your unholy strength.

Oh well, but this is how we normally show love in
our family.

And I am honestly pretty concerned about my darling
little brother...

I respect how you feel for your family. But it is
not good for Cid to suffer so much interference.

It's my duty to prevent anything improper from
happening. I can't allow some princess from god-
knows-where to deceive him and break his heart.

You are not standing in the way of Cid's happiness...
Are you?

Oh, that is corny. Princesses do say such funny
things.
Hehehe... Claire says the funniest things too...!
...What the hell is this...?!
What was that?
Something wrong?
Um... No, well...

Ahh, I know. I am suddenly so thirsty, think I'll
faint if I don't get some lemonade.
Oh, I see! I am so sorry I didn't notice.

Although I am unworthy, I, Rose Oriana, shall
immediately set off henceforth...

Stop! Drop the fancy language! I am going to buy his
lemonade!
B-But...!
I know what Cid likes far better than you.
And while I am gone, keep those hands to yourself.

(...She knows me so well already? It's true, so I
can't say anything back...)

Even though you'd never do anything like that, right?
Haha...haaa...?
...Cid, you and Claire are really close, aren't you.
Really? I think we're normal though.
I feel like I can see something like...a bond.
Of course. I mean, we're siblings.
What is Claire like?
Huh, why?
I am a bit concerned...
Huh? About what?

She practiced with a sword very seriously when she
was a child.
So Claire has been quite strong since she was young.

Yup yup. She was always fighting in the forests on
our family's land.

I think she was kinda scared of animals? Well, it's
likely that the wild animals were also scared of her,
come to think of it.

I remember she once said that she fought a bear that
was damaging the fields, but neither of our parents
believed her.
Well...you believed her, didn't you, Cid?
Me? Believe her? Hmm... Yeah, I guess I believed her.
And then the next day, my sister suddenly...

As Cid begins telling more stories, a somewhat
nostalgic expression appears on his face. Rose
starts to feel a little overwhelmed.

(Oh...there are so many memories between the two of
you.)

(Well, that makes sense. They are siblings that lived
together for a long time.)

(If I find that vexing...then it is just proof that
my training has not been sufficient.)

(Anyway...when it comes to strength of emotion,
I refuse to lose!)

(More than anything else, Claire is Cid's sister by
blood...! I, Rose, have the advantage here!)
...Erm, hello? Are you listening? Hellooo.

(That is right⁠—I will get Cid in the end.
Please wait for me, Cid.)
Is she off in her own world...?

(Though there is no mistake we have many tall
mountains to traverse to reach that moment.
If I think about that, it is a bit dispiriting...)
(But! The two of us together can overcome anything!)
That's right! Cid!!
Rose suddenly grasps Cid's hand.
Wha... What???
Not surprisingly, Cid's face is completely blank.
Heehee... Thanks to you Cid, I feel renewed somehow.
I see... That's...good?

Anyway, Claire's been away for quite a while.
What could possibly be taking her so long?
Hm...? What was that noise?

Help, it's terrible! She's surrounded! They're
attacking her! Someone! Help her!
What? Who is being attacked? Where?

On that street over there...! Look!
The lemonade stand!
Could it be my sister?
Cid! Let's go help Claire!
